name: Squaresv1
description: Recreation of the art example with boxes rotating and being slightly displaced the further down you go in the loop. Started with creating two for loops to create a grid with squares, After that I added rotation and displacement.

name: Squaresv2
description: Changed color space and added a low framrate to give a sort of blinking effect

name: Squaresv3(circles)
description: Circles now instead. Added a framecounter to fill up the canvas and then stop after 10 frames

name: Noise1(tornado)
description: Experimented around with noise. Managed to create a tornado looking thing which i thought was pretty cool. The image only uses 2 vertexes but looks like something with many lines.

name: Noise2(largesketch)
description: Took the previous code from noise1 and changed some values and added random color, resulted in a more chaotic sketched look.

name: Noise3(meltingtornado)
description: Wanted to see what happened if i added two clasing counters to the shape.

name: Noise4(tornadobounce)
description: Added a way to reverse the movement creating an infinte bounce up and down.
